title: Assessing the Performance of a Graph-based Clustering Algorithm

author: Pasquale Foggia, University of Naples Federico II

segmentation: Good afternoon, I am pasquala folder from the University of Naples.
My poster is about the assessment of the performance of graph based clustering.
Algorism in the poster, we define a graph based clustering algorithm based on the minimum spanning tree.
But once we have defined the algorithm, we have to evaluate its performance.
So we've chosen three recent algorithms from the literature to have comparison and we have chosen several performance performance indices to evaluate clustering all the performance.

In this is basically evaluate if the elements in a cluster are close together and if element belonging to different clusters are well separated, but each index is a slightly different way of measuring how this is achieved and then we have constructed database of synthetic graphs for performing our experiment.
Because this allows us to change several parameters and to evaluate outperform.
The indexes change with the this parameters and finally in the poster I will show the results of this comparative evaluation and that's all, thank you.
